text: Mitzi...Roarin' in the 20s is a 1976 Emmy Award winning television special starring Mitzi Gaynor. ==Overview== The variety show included music and comedy and guest starred Carl Reiner, Linda Hopkins and Ken Berry.IMDb - Full cast and crew for Mitzi... Roarin' in the 20's It was produced by Jack Bean, Tom Biener and Harry Waterson; and directed by Brian Bartholomew and Keaton S. Walker. ==Awards== Costume designer Bob Mackie won an Emmy for "Outstanding Achievement in Costume Design for Music-Variety".IMDb - Awards for Mitzi... Roarin' in the 20's John Freschi won an Emmy for "Outstanding Achievement in Lighting Direction". ==References== ==External links== * Category:1976 television specials Category:1970s American television specials Category:Music television specials Category:CBS television specials
title: Mitzi...Roarin' in the 20's
